title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 5
description: You are the murderer here dream.

dialogueTree.title: Limbic System: "Like a deftly cast fishing net, sle..."
dialogueTree.text: Like a deftly cast fishing net, sleep pulls you out of the world and into its dark shore. The rough mesh chafes, then, tightening around you, it digs into your brain.

links.title: You: "Great. This is gonna be really chil..."
links.text: Great. This is gonna be really chill.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "How've things been going for you ou..."
links.text: How've things been going for you out there? Helped anyone lately? Saved anyone lately? *Murdered* anyone lately?

links.title: Rhetoric: "This bastard isn't even listening t..."
links.text: This bastard isn't even listening to you!

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Because, you know, you *are* a murd..."
links.text: Because, you know, you *are* a murderer. A disco music listening psycho-killer who offs poor people -- and then *forgets* about it.

links.title: You: "I don't care. That doesn't scare me..."
links.text: I don't care. That doesn't scare me.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? You were *naive* to thin..."
links.text: Hear that? You were *naive* to think he's afraid of his bloodied hands, soul brother. Oh no, I see inside his amygdala and his hippocampus. The thing he's *really* scared of...

links.title: Limbic System: "...is much, *much* worse than that."
links.text: ...is much, *much* worse than that.

links.title: You: "What is it?"
links.text: What is it?

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Don't tell him, sister. It's too ba..."
links.text: Don't tell him, sister. It's too bad.

links.title: Volition: "They're right. This is their functi..."
links.text: They're right. This is their function. To keep you from *it*.

links.title: You: "Why are you doing this? I just want..."
links.text: Why are you doing this? I just want to sleep. I can almost see the dark.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "We're trying to help you. All these..."
links.text: We're trying to help you. All these processes -- these tortures, voices and tremors -- are all just *distractions*. Flares and countermeasures. To keep you from the *last dream*. The worst of them all.

links.title: You: "The... last dream?"
links.text: The... last dream?

links.title: Limbic System: "The last dream will be total annihi..."
links.text: The last dream will be total annihilation. Cinders peeling off the fuselage. We won't be there to help you anymore, Harry. We will be dormant. You will be naked and alone.

links.title: You: "And the air will smell of apricots...."
links.text: And the air will smell of apricots...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Of hell and ancient sadness, brothe..."
links.text: Of hell and ancient sadness, brother. Ten thousand years later -- in front of the video rental. There is a warm breath on your face again. Everything is *okay* again.

links.title: Limbic System: "Everything is *so* okay."
links.text: Everything is *so* okay.

links.title: You: "Doesn't sound like it will be okay."
links.text: Doesn't sound like it will be okay.

links.title: Limbic System: "Your eyelids flutter open for a mom..."
links.text: Your eyelids flutter open for a moment. When you close them again, you sense the light of the room around you -- you're back. In two seconds the alarm will ring.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The last thought in your head befor..."
links.text: The last thought in your head before waking is: maybe you shouldn't have seen that stained glass window? In the church....

links.title: You: "[Open your eyes.]"
links.text: [Open your eyes.]

links.title: Inland Empire: "The last thought in your head befor..."
links.text: The last thought in your head before waking is: you need to go to the church...

links.title: You: "I can't wait. I can't wait..."
links.text: I can't wait. I can't wait...

links.title: You: "Her face forms in summertime..."
links.text: Her face forms in summertime...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "...in hell and ancient sadness, bro..."
links.text: ...in hell and ancient sadness, brother. Ten thousand years later -- in front of the video rental. There is a warm breath on your face again. Everything is *okay* again.

links.title: You: "I don't *want to* anymore. I don't..."
links.text: I don't *want to* anymore. I don't want to think either one of those things.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Oh, but you *will*. You're already..."
links.text: Oh, but you *will*. You're already *going* there. Slipping. How long can we keep you from the precipice? *One* more dream? Two max, baby. Then it's...

links.title: You: "Okay, so I'm a murderer and that's..."
links.text: Okay, so I'm a murderer and that's *bad*.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? He doesn't even flinch...."
links.text: Hear that? He doesn't even flinch. Ice-man doesn't care about killing people. That's *nothing* to him. Black water under the bridge. The thing he's *really* scared of...

links.title: You: "Shut up, I just want to sleep."
links.text: Shut up, I just want to sleep.

links.title: Limbic System: "Hear that? Ice-man wants to sleep,..."
links.text: Hear that? Ice-man wants to sleep, he doesn't care about killing people. That's *nothing* to him. Black water under the bridge. The thing he's *really* scared of...

links.title: You: "Dark shore, my ass. I know what thi..."
links.text: Dark shore, my ass. I know what this is.

links.title: You: "Yeah-yeah, just let me sleep..."
links.text: Yeah-yeah, just let me sleep...
